title: Fighting to the death: one Syrian rebel's story
text:
Fighting to the death: one Syrian rebel's story 8:46pm GMT - 01:33 
Fouad al-Ghraibi has lost parts of his liver and intestines in Syria's conflict - but not his determination to keep fighting. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Fouad al-Ghraibi has lost parts of his liver and intestines in Syria's conflict - but not his determination to keep fighting. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pjKRvY
